page.title: 13Church,Earlston
page.content: The{Church}was built in 1892. There are 762 people who are members of the church. This year there have been 5 Christenings and Baptisms in 1984 there were 12. This year there have been no weddings but there will be six from July until September. The pictures in the vestry are of past ministers in Earlston. Since 1970, 471 people have joined the Church. The average number each year being 31.The highest number to join since 1970 was in 1974 when 54 people joined, compared to 1980 when only 11 people joined. The present minister has been minister of the church for about 6 years.
